org.hotteam67.common

Class SchemaHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hotteam67.common.SchemaHandler

  • public final class SchemaHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The handler for the schema system, which populates and updates the contents of a tableview with the schema's requested items

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • GetCurrentValues

        public static org.json.JSONObject GetCurrentValues(android.widget.TableLayout table)
        Get the current values from an already populated TableLayout
        Parameters:
        table - the table layout that already fits a schema
        Returns:
        a JSONObject with tags for each schema tag and values from the table

      • Setup

        public static void Setup(android.widget.TableLayout table,
                         org.json.JSONArray schema,
                         android.content.Context context)
        Generate a UI from a schem and populate a view
        Parameters:
        table - The TableLayout to setup
        schema - The schema to generate the views from
        context - The parent context to give the views

      • LoadSchemaFromFile

        public static org.json.JSONArray LoadSchemaFromFile()
        Load a schema from file into a jsonarray
        Returns:
        the schema as a JSONArray, containing JSONObjects for each schema item

      • ClearCurrentValues

        public static void ClearCurrentValues(android.widget.TableLayout table)
        Reset all of the values of a table to default
        Parameters:
        table - the table to reset the values of

      • SetCurrentValues

        public static void SetCurrentValues(android.widget.TableLayout table,
                                    org.json.JSONObject values)
        Set all of the values of a table to a specified value
        Parameters:
        table - the table to map values to
        values - the values to set, with tags corresponding to the schema tags and values to set
